issue.title: Test coverage

repository.name: kymatio
repository.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration

issue.body:
Tests are required for every single function in this codebase.

Rule: If you contributed the code, you are the person being looked to first for the tests. Please make sure your part is covered. Please ask for help.

- [ ] Fixing: https://github.com/eickenberg/scattering_transform/issues/2 (3d MAE)

issue.title: [DOC] solving Sphinx issues

repository.name: kymatio
repository.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration

issue.body:
W.r.t.:
Issues: #97  #110 #135 #105 #106 #108 #111 
PR: #144

We must find a way to remove the list of "ignore-patterns" here:

https://github.com/eickenberg/kymatio/blob/master/doc/source/conf.py#L61 

At the moment we do this, and that the sphinx works, then we will be good with the gallery!

body: @louity is(are) there some additional modification(s) you are willing to do?

Same issue here. There's no narrative.

Maybe we don't do this for 0.1.0-alpha, but we should keep these issues up until there's a good narrative for these.
@janden i agree. this can be deferred to `-beta` because it does not incur API-breaking changes (nor, indeed, any change in program behavior)
